data.eml:eml: A new species of Zetekella Drake from Ecuador with comments on Zetekella and Minitingis Barber (Heteroptera, Tingidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guidoti, Marcus, Guilbert, Eric (2018): A new species of Zetekella Drake from Ecuador with comments on Zetekella and Minitingis Barber (Heteroptera, Tingidae). ZooKeys 796: 291-299, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.796.23869, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.796.23869
